definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
meals (abbr. for 伙食[huo3 shi2])/variant of 夥|伙[huo3]
companion/partner/group/classifier for groups of people/to combine/together

sentences.english: Boy, that salesman was the biggest airhead I've ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 好家伙，那个男孩售货员是我见过的最愚蠢的人。

sentences.english: Goodfellas, Lexus coupe, there are now free to buy.
sentences.chinese: 好家伙，雷克萨斯轿跑车，现在有钱买闲地。

sentences.english: Man, there wasn't a sound in there.
sentences.chinese: 好家伙，那里没有一点声响。

sentences.english: “And boy, the blood bath will be extraordinary, ” he continued.
sentences.chinese: 他接着说“好家伙，这场屠杀将非同寻常。”

definition: see 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
You're really quite something!/You're just amazing!
startled/to frighten/scared out of one's skin
(onom.) expressing admiration or surprise/sound of a laugh
(interj. of admiration or of disgust)/to click one's tongue/to attempt to (find an opportunity to) speak
